author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Regal Entertainment Says U.S. FTC Granted Early Termination Of Waiting Period Under Hart-Scott-Rodino Act Of Proposed Merger Of Crown Merger Sub
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Regal Entertainment Group:
